name: 20-Minute Miso Pork Belly Noodles
instructions: Add pork belly to a cold pan. Season with salt.
Slowly render the pork belly until crispy. Remove and set aside.
Add butter to the pan, followed by garlic and shallots. Cook over medium heat until browned.
Stir in miso paste and soy sauce.
Add a little noodle water to the miso mixture.
Add cooked noodles to the pan and toss.
Return the pork belly to the pan.
Squeeze lemon juice over the noodles and pork belly.
